properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.data-center
properties.description: Specify the data center id which is the snowflake used to generate id

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.group
properties.description: Group is used to separate with different id center group, sometimes it can be the project name

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.zookeeper.servers
properties.description: Zookeeper cluster connection servers, comma separated

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.zookeeper.session-timeout-ms
properties.description: Timeout milliseconds of the session between zookeeper and id generator

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.zookeeper.namespace
properties.description: The namespace of id center use in zookeeper, when you use multiple id centers with a single zookeeper cluster, you should specify different namespace for each id center
